products_data.description: In soft cotton jersey, this slightly fitted T-shirt combines a rugby-inspired shield graphic and a banner that nods to Ralph Lauren's founding year.
products_data.title: Custom Slim Fit Graphic Tee

products_data.description: This striped shirt merges lightweight cotton poplin and a club collar for a smart look that's quintessential Polo.
products_data.title: Custom Fit Striped Shirt

products_data.description: This medium-wash cotton denim cap features Ralph Lauren's iconic Polo Sport logo at the front.
products_data.title: Limited-Edition Denim Cap

products_data.description: With its weathered "U.S.A. Athletic Team" print and a shield patch, these drawstring shorts nod to vintage American sportswear.
products_data.title: Cotton-Blend-Fleece Short
Custom-Fit Mesh Polo Shirt
products_data.description: This short-sleeved polo shirt is made from soft cotton mesh and tailored for a trim, modern fit.

products_data.title: Cotton-Blend-Fleece Hoodie
products_data.description: Whether you're off to the gym or running weekend errands, this hoodie is an easy toss-and-go layer thanks to its washed cotton-blend fleece.

products_data.title: Dress Trouser Sock 3-Pack
products_data.description: A stretch cotton blend and our signature embroidered pony make this three-pack of socks an easy choice for pairing with your workweek looks.

products_data.title: Dalvin Calfskin Oxford
products_data.description: True to our dedication to craftsmanship, this streamlined men's oxford is constructed by artisans in Italy from calfskin that is hand-burnished to achieve a rich depth of colour.

products_data.title: Chalmers Calfskin Penny Loafer
products_data.description: Created by skilled artisans in Italy from burnished calfskin, the Chalmers penny loafer is a refined style that offers long-lasting comfort. The soft rounded toe is constructed from the bottom up and sewn by hand, a time-consuming process that results in an ultra-flexible shoe.

products_data.title: Custom Slim Fit Cotton T-shirt
products_data.description: A trim silhouette and our signature embroidered pony give this classic crewneck T-shirt a fresh update.

products_data.title: Reversible Leather Belt
products_data.description: This sleek reversible belt is crafted from smooth saddle leather, and features one black side and one brown side for added versatility. It's a tried-and-true essential for any man's office wardrobe.

products_data.title: Montgomery Cocktail Shaker
products_data.description: This sophisticated cocktail shaker is designed with sleek horizontal lines around its chic cylindrical silhouette.

products_data.title: Slim Fit Denim Sport Shirt
products_data.description: Cut from rugged denim and tailored for a modern slim fit, this sport shirt is a versatile go-to for off-duty days. Finished with our multicoloured signature embroidered pony for added Polo style.

products_data.title: Reversible Leather Belt
products_data.description: Our signature embroidered pony is debossed at the tip of this reversible leather belt, adding a subtle heritage-inspired touch to this wardrobe essential. Features one black side and one brown side for added versatility.

products_data.title: Cotton Jersey Crewneck T-Shirt
products_data.description: This timelessly preppy tee is crafted from durable, soft cotton jersey.

products_data.title: Alligator Commuter Bag
products_data.description: Constructed in Italy from hand-selected American alligator, this elegant bag is an ultra-luxurious way to carry your documents, magazines and laptop. It features a high-gloss finish, exterior piping made from hand-cut-and-stained leather and a soft cowhide interior with multiple pockets for storing important items.

products_data.title: Gosforth Calf Lace-Up Shoe
products_data.description: The Gosforth dress shoe is exquisitely crafted in Italy from calfskin leather and designed with a rounded toe.

products_data.title: Bi-Swing Windbreaker
products_data.description: This lightweight windbreaker is designed with a bi-swing construction that allows for enhanced mobility. The crisp-weather essential also has a peached microfibre shell that's water repellent and incredibly soft. Wear it over a button-down and dark jeans for a go-anywhere off-duty look.

products_data.title: Sander Boat Shoe
products_data.description: This iconic, preppy deck shoe is crafted from bold-hued cotton canvas and is perfect for a day on the boat or at the club.

products_data.title: Nappa Leather Soft Ricky 33
products_data.description: This Soft Ricky is made in Italy from layers of hand-stitched Italian nappa leather and features a contrasting bonded-calfskin lining that adds a rich pop of colour. This lightweight version of our iconic Ricky Bag takes up to eight hours to construct and is finished with our custom logo-embossed leather-covered signature lock.

products_data.title: Custom-Fit Lightweight Chino
products_data.description: This essential trouser is crafted from lightweight washed cotton chino and cut for a trim-fitting silhouette.

products_data.title: Telly Leather Penny Loafer
products_data.description: This classic penny loafer is dressed up enough to wear with a blazer, while a flexible rubber outsole makes it comfortable enough for every day.

products_data.title: Pinyon Fringe Throw Pillow
products_data.description: This handsome throw pillow features intricate Western-style embossing and fringe, which gives it a rugged look.

products_data.title: Brittany II Nappa Flat
products_data.description: This chic ballet flat is crafted from rich nappa leather and designed with a rubber outsole that provides superior traction.

products_data.title: Palmer Sham
products_data.description: Our Palmer sham is crafted from luxuriously soft 464-thread-count cotton percale and designed with elegant cream piping. Make it uniquely your own by adding an embroidered monogram to this sham for an additional £10.
